title: Rajesh Khanna gave nothing to Dimple Kapadia, changes his will before death, gave Rs 600 crore property to... - India.com
summary:
Rajesh Khanna's Will: Leaving Behind a Legacy for His Daughters

Publication Date: Not specified Source: India.com

Rajesh Khanna, the first superstar of Hindi cinema, is remembered not just for his on-screen charm but also for the complexities of his personal life, notably his marriage to actress Dimple Kapadia. Despite his affections for her, his final will revealed he left nothing for her, choosing instead to bequeath his wealth to their daughters.

  • Khanna's marriage to Dimple Kapadia encountered numerous challenges despite the couple having two daughters.
  • In his later years, Rajesh Khanna faced significant health issues, ultimately battling cancer.
  • His will, finalized as he neared death, allocated his extensive fortune exclusively to his daughters, leaving Dimple Kapadia with nothing.
“I want nothing for myself. Everything should go to my daughters,” – Rajesh Khanna.

This story serves as a poignant reminder of the personal struggles faced by even the most beloved stars, shedding light on the sometimes painful realities behind the glamour of fame.
newTitle: Rajesh Khanna's Will: Leaving Behind a Legacy for His Daughters

Varun Dhawan’s film Baby John shows a modest box office recovery, collecting ₹4.25 crore on its fourth day, bringing total earnings to ₹23.90 crore despite tough competition from Pushpa 2.

title: Malayalam film and television actor Dileep Shankar found dead in hotel room in Thiruvananthapuram - The Indian Express
summary:
Malayalam Actor Dileep Shankar Found Dead in Hotel Room

Publication Date: December 29, 2024 | Source: Indian Express

Dileep Shankar, a well-known Malayalam film and television actor, was found dead in a hotel room in Thiruvananthapuram. His death is currently under investigation.

  • Dileep was in Thiruvananthapuram for filming and rented the hotel room four days prior.
  • He had not been seen outside for two days before his body was discovered.
  • Initial investigations suggest no signs of foul play in his death.
  • His friend Seema G Nair expressed her sorrow on social media.
“Didn’t you call me 5 days ago… I couldn’t talk because I was lying down with a headache… What happened to you Dileep… I don’t know what to write. Condolences.” - Seema G Nair

The incident has raised concerns among his colleagues and fans, while the police continue their inquiries into the circumstances of his death.

summary:

  • Mr Beast invested $100 million in producing 'Beast Games.'
  • The show involves over a thousand contestants competing in various challenges.
  • 'Beast Games' surpassed other major productions like 'Game of Thrones' ($50 million) and 'Squid Game' ($22 million).

title: Doctors review: Sharad Kelkar is the beating heart of this brilliant, raw take on medical professionals' lives - Hindustan Times
summary:
Doctors Review: The New Medical Drama Starring Sharad Kelkar and Harleen Sethi

Date: Dec 29, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Set in a fictitious Mumbai hospital, Doctors explores the life of young resident Nitya, who seeks revenge against renowned neurosurgeon Dr Ishaan, only to discover the complexities of the medical profession and her own identity along the way.

  • The series offers a refreshing take on the medical drama genre, avoiding melodrama for a more authentic portrayal.
  • Strong performances by Sharad Kelkar and Harleen Sethi enhance the emotional depth of the show.
  • Addresses serious issues like euthanasia and substance abuse without moral judgment, making for a relatable narrative.
  • Creator Siddharth P Malhotra presents a nuanced depiction of doctors' lives beyond just professional duties.
“Doctors is a palatable, entertaining drama, which makes it even more special.”

Overall, Doctors stands out in the OTT landscape for its engaging storytelling and character-driven narrative.
newTitle: Doctors Review: A Raw Look at Medical Professionals Starring Sharad Kelkar

title: Viduthalai Part 2 Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 9: Vijay Sethupathi Starrer Crosses The 50 Crore Milestone - Koimoi
summary:
Viduthalai Part 2 Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 9: Vijay Sethupathi Starrer Crosses The 50 Crore Milestone

Publication Date: December 30, 2024

Source: Koimoi

The Vijay Sethupathi starrer Tamil period political crime film Viduthalai Part 2 has been witnessing an underwhelming performance at the box office. However, on its 9th day, the film is just 16 lakhs away from entering the safe zone, thanks to a modest budget. Let us look at the film’s box office performance on its 9th day.

Key Points:

  • On its 9th day, the India net collection stands at 34.84 crores.
  • The gross collection comes to 41.11 crores.
  • Overseas collection amounts to 9.25 crores.
  • Total worldwide collection is 50.36 crores.
  • The film has a budget of 35 crores, almost recovering 99% of its budget.
  • Anticipated to enter the safe zone by tomorrow.
“Even though the movie has not received the response that it was expected from it, it is all set to enter the safe zone.”

In conclusion, while Viduthalai Part 2 has had mixed reviews and is facing competition, it is on track to recover its budget and may see improved collections going forward.
newTitle: Viduthalai Part 2 Worldwide Box Office Collection Day 9: Vijay Sethupathi Starrer Crosses The 50 Crore Milestone

title: Box Office: 10 Potential Big Hits Of Bollywood In 2025 – Chhava, Sikandar To Housefull 5, War 2 – Hindi Films Gear Up To Roar! - Koimoi
summary:
10 Potential Big Hits Of Bollywood In 2025

Date: 2024

Source: Koimoi

The Indian box office is looking promising for 2025 with several high-profile films slated for release. Major titles include Vicky Kaushal’s Chhava, Salman Khan’s Sikandar, and the highly anticipated Housefull 5.

  • Sky Force: A war film led by Akshay Kumar releasing on Republic Day.
  • Chhava: Based on Chhatrapati Sambhaji Maharaj, releasing on February 14, 2025.
  • Sikandar: Set for Eid 2025, expects to be a blockbuster.
  • Jolly LLB 3: Releasing on April 11, 2025.
  • Raid 2: Starring Ajay Devgn, releasing on May 1, 2025.
  • Housefull 5: Multistarrer comedy set to release on June 6, 2025.
  • War 2: Highly anticipated sequel releasing on August 14, 2025.
  • Baaghi 4: Expected to revive Tiger Shroff's career; releasing on September 5, 2025.
  • Thama: Ayushmann Khurrana's horror comedy set for Diwali 2025.
  • Alpha: Featuring Alia Bhatt, releasing on December 25, 2025.

With this lineup, Bollywood aims to make a significant impact at the box office, bringing excitement to audiences in the upcoming year.
newTitle: 10 Potential Big Hits Of Bollywood In 2025
